name: testbukalapak
description: Automation use WebdriverIO for All Platform and Mocha for API

scripts.allure-report: node_modules/.bin/allure generate --output reports/allure-report --clean ./reports/allure-results && allure open reports/allure-report
scripts.test-prod-desktop-chrome: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-chrome.conf.js --baseUrl=http://www.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-prod-desktop-firefox: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-firefox.conf.js --baseUrl=http://www.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-prod-desktop-safari: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-safari.conf.js --baseUrl=http://www.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-prod-desktop-opera: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-opera.conf.js --baseUrl=http://www.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-prod-desktop-all-browser: concurrently "npm run test-prod-desktop-chrome" "npm run test-prod-desktop-firefox" "npm run test-prod-desktop-safari" "npm run test-prod-desktop-opera"
scripts.test-stag-desktop-chrome: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-chrome.conf.js --baseUrl=http://staging.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-stag-desktop-firefox: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-firefox.conf.js --baseUrl=http://staging.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-stag-desktop-safari: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-safari.conf.js --baseUrl=http://staging.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-stag-desktop-opera: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.desktop-opera.conf.js --baseUrl=http://staging.bukalapak.com && npm run cucumber-report
scripts.test-stag-desktop-all-browser: concurrently "npm run test-stag-desktop-chrome" "npm run test-stag-desktop-firefox" "npm run test-stag-desktop-safari" "npm run test-stag-desktop-opera"
scripts.test-android: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report/* && node node_modules/.bin/wdio integration/main/config/suite.android.conf.js && npm run cucumber-report

author: Rifki Nurgraha
